name: Bionic Combatives
description: A modern combat style for the post-modern human.  Nicknamed "Biojutsu", Bionic Combatives combines integrated weaponry, armor and augments into an consolidated fighting discipline.
initiate: BEGINNING BIONIC COMBATIVES PROGRAM. INITIATING COMBAT PROTOCOLS.
%s starts moving with swift robotic precision.

static_buffs.name: Biojutsu Stance

onkill_buffs.name: Optimization
onkill_buffs.description:
>10 LOCATE TARGET
>20 EXECUTE TARGET
>30 GOTO 10

+1 Accuracy, +2 all damage.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 3 times.

name: Centipede Kung Fu
description: One of the Five Deadly Venoms, used by Zhang Yiaotian.  Centipede Style uses an onslaught of rapid strikes.  Each attack you land increases your attack speed.  Critical hits increase your damage further.
initiate: You ready yourself to attack as fast as possible.

onhit_buffs.name: Centipede's Frenzy
onhit_buffs.description:
Your attacks are a blur of hands and legs that become faster as your strike your opponents without rest.

-4 move cost.
Lasts 3 turns.  Stacks 4 times.

oncrit_buffs.name: Centipede's Venom
oncrit_buffs.description:
Your venom burns your opponents at the worst of times.

+2 bashing damage.
Lasts 2 turns.

name: Lizard Kung Fu
description: One of the Five Deadly Venoms, used by Meng Tianxia.  Lizard Style focuses on using walls to your advantage.  Standing near a wall provides a large bonus to Dodge skill and moving near a wall gives a large bonus to accuracy.  Stronger techniques are enabled when near a wall.
initiate: You ready yourself to attack from any angle.

static_buffs.name: Lizard's Cunning
static_buffs.description:
By briefly scaling, leaping, or pushing off a nearby wall, you can avoid the worst of your opponents attacks.

+3.0 Dodge skill when near a wall.
Enables "Lizard Tail" and "Lizard Wall Counter" techniques when near a wall.

onhit_buffs.name: Lizard's Venom
onhit_buffs.description:
Your venom is a long lasting pain that your opponents will never forget.

+2 bash damage.
Lasts 4 turns.

onmove_buffs.name: Lizard's Leap
onmove_buffs.description:
By briefly scaling, leaping, or pushing off a nearby wall, can attack downward at unsuspecting opponents.

+3 Accuracy when near a wall.
Lasts 3 turns.

name: Scorpion Kung Fu
description: One of the Five Deadly Venoms, used by Gao Ji.  Scorpion Style is a mysterious art which uses pincer-like hands and a stinger kick.  Moving enables a stunning pincer attack.  Critical hits do massive damage and knock your opponent back along with anyone your opponent comes in contact with.
initiate: You prepare to capture and sting your foes.

static_buffs.name: Scorpion's Venom
static_buffs.description:
Your venom is a constant threat that nothing can escape from.

+2 bashing damage.

onattack_buffs.name: Scorpion's Intimidation
onattack_buffs.description:
Nothing is scarier than an angry scropion.  Your attacks can keep others at bay.

+1 Dodge attempts.
Lasts 1 turn.

onmove_buffs.name: Scorpion's Charge
onmove_buffs.description:
Rush foward and catch your prey!

+10% damage.
Enables "Pincer Strike" technique.
Stacks 2 times.  Lasts 2 turns.

name: Toad Kung Fu
description: One of the Five Deadly Venoms, used by Liang Shen.  Masters of Toad Style can focus themselves to protect against all attacks.  You have powerful armor against physical attacks, though you will lose focus when you move.  You can meditate by pausing, giving yourself more armor for a short time.
initiate: You pause for a moment and focus on your invincible body.

static_buffs.name: Toad's Iron Skin
static_buffs.description:
Your body is as strong as iron but only if you don't move.

+6 bash, cut, and stab armor.
static_buffs.//: FWIW, this is twice the amount of armor provided by bionic plating.

onmove_buffs.name: Iron Skin Dissipation
onmove_buffs.description:
Moving causes you to lose your iron skin.

-1 bash, cut, and stab armor.
Lasts 6 turns.  Stacks 6 times.

onpause_buffs.name: Toad's Meditation
onpause_buffs.description:
By concentrating for a moment, you can bolster the strength of your iron skin.

+3 bash, cut, and stab armor.
Lasts 2 turns.

ongethit_buffs.name: Toad's Venom
ongethit_buffs.description:
Your venom is just another lesson about the strength of your iron body.

+2 bash damage.
Lasts 5 turns.

name: Viper Kung Fu
description: A legacy of the Five Deadly Venoms, use by Qi Dong.  Viper Style (originally called Snake Style) has a unique three-part combo, which initiates on a dodge, then follows up with a stunning Viper Bite and then finishes with the legendary Viper Strike.
initiate: You prepare to strike your foes' weaknesses.

static_buffs.name: Viper's Patience
static_buffs.description:
Every snake waits for the perfect moment to strike.  Turn your opponents' mistakes into your opportunity to strike!

+1.0 Dodge skill.

ondodge_buffs.name: Viper's Ambush
ondodge_buffs.description:
Your evasiveness has left your opponent wide open to painful bite.

Enables "Viper Bite" technique.
Lasts 1 turn.

ondodge_buffs.name: Viper's Venom
ondodge_buffs.description:
Your venom is a harsh reminder to never tease a predator.

+2 bash damage.
Lasts 3 turn.

name: Venom Mob Protege
description: You are a pupil of the Venom Clan.  You start with one of the five deadly venoms: Centipede, Viper, Scorpion, Lizard, or Toad.
